import React, { Component } from 'react'; import './style.less' export default class Drag extends Component { constructor(props){ super(props) this.state = { dragSize: props.sizeOptions[0], // 移动块的大小类型，小：small、中：middle、大：great、宽：relax、巨：giant sizeOptions: props.sizeOptions, // 父组件传递过来的大小型号的选项，默认第一个是初始型号 } } componentDidMount(){ console.log(this.state.dragSize) console.log(this.state.dragSize == "small") console.log(this.state.dragSize == "middle") console.log(this.state.dragSize == "great") console.log(this.state.dragSize == "relax") console.log(this.state.dragSize == "giant") } render() { return (
{this.props.title}（）
